body.instruction: Select the image of each emperor to learn more about what they did during their reign.

front.content: Claudius ©De Agostini Picture Library / ImageQuest 2021

back.content:
Reign: 41 CE–54 CE.

I am known for:
  • building the Aqua Claudia
  • being a successful military commander
